text: All wars are civil wars, because all men are brothers.
author: Francois Fenelon

text: Education is that whole system of human training within and without the school house walls, which molds and develops men.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

text: I swear by that old expression, 'One monkey don't stop no show!' The reality is, we still have some good men out there, and we should hail those men as the kings they are.
author: Angie Stone

text: I never yet feared those men who set a place apart in the middle of their cities where they gather to cheat one another and swear oaths which they break.
author: Herodotus

text: The mountains, the forest, and the sea, render men savage they develop the fierce, but yet do not destroy the human.
author: Victor Hugo
